description: Muscular Troy Daniels was getting ready to leave the office in chiseled Paddy O’Brian’s clothing when he’s intercepted midway through getting dressed by the big dick stud himself. Paddy sends his assistant away, and demands tattooed Troy get undressed so he can teach him a lesson about borrowing other people’s things. Horny Paddy bends the tall hunk over to rim his hole, and pound it in doggy style.
title: Putting the ASS in Assistant: Part 3
